text: Avaday () is a rural locality (a village) in Kubiyazovsky Selsoviet of Askinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 13 . There are 2 streets. == Geography == The village is located 19 km from Askino and 4 km from Kubiyazy. == Ethnicity == The village is inhabited by Bashkirs. == References == Category:Rural localities in Askinsky District
title: Avaday
